entry.title: MYTEE S-300H 'TEMPO' HEATED CARPET AND UPHOLSTERY EXTRACTOR ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mytee
Type: Equipment
Price: 1023.99

S-300H Tempo™ Heated Extractor is a sub-compact machine, but a full-size performer. 

Don’t let its small size fool you – Mytee’s® S-300H Tempo™ Heated Extractor is a powerhouse. Perfect for serious auto detailing, carpet, and upholstery spotting, the 600 watt heated S-300H Tempo™ packs a lot of power into a small package. And at only 26 pounds, you’ll find that the Tempo™ takes a load off your back, without taking a load out of your wallet.

Features:

  • One of the most powerful vacuum motors in its class producing 85″ of water lift for maximum extraction
  • Powerful 600 watt heater
  • Two-stage vacuum motor reduces dry times
  • 1 gallon tank capacity (approx.)
  • Compact design – weighs only 26 lbs., easy to transport and store. 
  • Convenient transport handle and wheels
  • Durable in roto-molded housing

Includes:

  • 4″ stainless steel upholstery tool (Part # 8400)
  • 8′ vacuum and internal solution hose combo
  • Heatguard Hose Wrap (Part # A104)
  • 25′ power cord (Part # E617A) 

Water Resistant Switches
Water resistant switches add protection against dust and water intrusion.

Lighted Power Cords
Lighted power cords indicator plug glows when the cord has power.
 
 
Solution Tank 1 gallon (approx.)
Recovery Tank 1 gallon (approx.)
Body Roto-molded polyethylene
Vacuum 2 stage
Water Lift 85"
CFM 97
Pump Solenoid
PSI 55
GPM 0.37
Wheels 2" casters
Power cord Single 25' 16/3
Amp Draw 12
Upholatery Tool 4" stainless steel
Hose 8' vacuum and internal solution hose combo
Product Weight 26 lbs
Shipping Weight 38 lbs

entry.title: MYTEE PREP CENTER S™ ALL-IN-ONE DETAIL MACHINE ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mytee
Type: Equipment
Price: 3859.99

The 80-120 Prep Center S™ Is Your New Pit Crew.

The new Prep Center S™ from Mytee is the next chapter in our revolutionary Prep Center series. The newly redesigned chassis makes the Prep Center S™ slimmer and more mobile than its predecessors, without compromising functionality. In fact, we gave it Even More Capacity! With its all-in-one design and intuitive features meant to maximize efficiency, the Prep Center S™ will have you doing laps around your competition, not your shop!

Includes:

  • 8400P Air Lite™ Upholstery Tool
  • 25′ vacuum & solution hose combo
  • 25′ dry vacuum hose
  • Dry vacuum claw
  • Dry vacuum crevice tool
  • Blower attachment tool

Features:

  • 12 gallon (approx.) solution and recovery tanks.
  • 3-stage low amp vacuum motor, 100 CFM, 130” water lift.
  • 120 PSI viton-sealed solution pump.
  • Exclusive REAL HEAT™ system produces hot water using a 1,200-watt in-line heating system with a maximum temperature of 210˚ F.
  • Convenient faucet fill hose.
  • Wet and dry vacuum capability.
  • Interior and exterior drying capability, complete with attachments.
  • Contains tool organization and storage including a tray to keep tools in order and easily store them after each job.
  • Multiple chemical dispensing with three bottles powered by a shop air compressor and a 25′ coiled hose with adjustable gun for each bottle.
  • Durable roto-molded polyethylene material which resists rust and denting.

When it comes to your automotive detailing business; choose a proven winner. Out pace the competition. Order an 80-120 Prep Center S™ now!

entry.title: MYTEE HP120 'GRAND PRIX' HEATED CARPET AND UPHOLSTERY EXTRACTOR ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: mytee
Type: Equipment
Price: 2499.99

HP120 Grand Prix™ Automotive Heated Detail Extractor

 

HP120 Grand Prix™ Automotive Heated Detail Extractor

Need a larger tank capacity? The HP120 Grand Prix™ Heated Carpet Extractor combines, mobility, power, and innovative engineering. It’s no wonder that it’s a favorite among automotive detailers. 

The original Grand Prix™, known as the HP100, transformed the automotive detailing industry. It was the first heated carpet extractor to feature a single power cord. Doesn’t sound like much? Before the Grand Prix™ using a pump, vacuum and heater required two power cords. This made it hard to find an appropriate power source. But with the engineering ingenuity at Mytee®, this trailblazer changed all that. Or so the saying goes…the rest is history.

Features:

  • REAL HEAT™ system with a 1,200-watt in-line heater with maximum 210˚ temperature produces hot water that quickly breaks up grease and dirt
  • Single 3-stage LA (low amp) motor makes the extractor even more effective
  • 130″ of water lift and 100 CFM
  • 10-gallon solution tank
  • A high drain valve useful for emptying into a standard bucket
  • Compact design fits perfectly into a van, truck or storage area
  • Durable roto-molded polyethylene material housing, made to resist rust or denting

Includes:

  • 15′ vacuum and internal solution hose, 1.5″ (Part #8501)
  • 4″ stainless steel upholstery tool 
  • Heatguard™ hosewrap, made of neoprene wetsuit material

entry.title: MYTEE 8070 MYTEE-LITE HEATED CARPET AND UPHOLSTERY EXTRACTOR ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mytee
Type: Equipment
Price: 1639.99

THE BEST SELLING AUTOMOTIVE DETAILING EXTRACTOR IN ITS CLASS.

MYTEE 8070 LITE III 3RD GEN.

Are you looking for an upholstery spotting machine that can do the job of a full-size carpet extractor, but is small and lightweight enough to hold in one hand? Meet the Mytee Lite™ 8070 Heated Carpet Extractor, our best-selling automotive detailing extractor and upholstery machine and the first in the industry to include an on-board heater for maximum cleaning power. It runs on only one power cord for maximum convenience wherever you go. At four gallons, it’s perfect for both upholstery spotting and small detailing jobs. The Mytee Lite™ packs performance and versatility into one compact and efficient machine.

THE MYTEE LITE™ FEATURES:

  • 4 gallon (approx.) capacity tanks

  • New and improved single 3-stage motor – 100 CFM, 130″ water lift

  • 1,000-watt in-line heater which produces hot water to quickly break up grease and dirt

  • Faucet fill hose for easy fill solution tank

  • Recovery tank drain hose

  • Compact size and easy-push handle for easy transportation and storage

INCLUDES:

  • 15ft. 1.25″ vacuum and internal solution hose (Part #8501)

  • 8400P Air Lite™ upholstery tool

  • Heatguard™ hosewrap, made of neoprene wetsuit material

  • Easy-push handle with convenient storage basket

  • A110 Drain Hose

entry.title: MYTEE 20-110 DELUXE DETAILING PREP CENTER W/ HEAT ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mytee
Type: Equipment
Price: 2968.99

MYTEE 20-110 DELUXE PREP CENTER IS YOUR NEW PIT CREW.

Here, all in one place, is the answer to your automotive detailing needs — the versatile Mytee® 20-110 Deluxe Prep Center™ Automotive Detailer, the first extractor ever manufactured by Mytee®. It is a longtime favorite among mobile detailers, car washes, new and used car dealerships, body shops, vehicle auctions, and automotive rental agencies.

This mobile all-in-one workstation performs a variety of jobs on a single 25’ power cord. The Deluxe Prep Center™ will save time and money. Best of all, it will increase production. Moving vehicles from machine to machine for each detailing task is a thing of the past!

INCLUDES:

  • 25’ vacuum/solution hose combo
  • 4” stainless steel upholstery tool
  • On-board chemical storage

FEATURES:

  • Heated extraction powered by a viton-sealed 120 PSI pump
  • Two easy-to-fill-and-empty 6-gallon tanks: one for clean water, one to collect extracted water
  • Exclusive REAL HEAT™ system produces hot water with 1,200-watt in-line heater with maximum 210˚ temperature which quickly breaks up grease and dirt
  • Wet and dry vacuum capability
  • 3-stage LA (low amp) vacuum motor, 130” water lift
  • Interior and exterior drying capability, complete with attachments
  • Contains tool organization and storage including a tray to keep tools in order and easily store them after each job
  • Multiple chemical dispensing with four bottles powered by a shop air compressor and a 25′ coiled hose with adjustable gun for each bottle
  • Durable roto-molded polyethylene material which resists rust and denting

When it comes to your automotive detailing business. Choose a proven winner. Out pace the competition. Order a 20-110 Deluxe Prep Center™ now!

Water resistant switches add protection against dust and water intrusion.

Lighted Power Cords

Lighted power cords indicator plug glows when the cord has power.

entry.title: Mytee Spyder Carpet Extractor ***
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mytee
Type: Equipment
Price: 2299.99


The Mytee HP60 Spyder carpet extractor from Mytee Products is perfect for the medium size detail shop or rapidly growing mobile detailing business. The Mytee HP60 hot water extractor features two 5-gallon capacity tanks. The Mytee HP60 carpet extractor has a powerful 3 stage vacuum, 1200 watt in-line heating system and a 120 psi pump. The HP60 Spyder also comes standard with 15' vacuum and solution hoses and a durable Mytee AirLite Tool.

You can purchase the optional Mytee Crevice Tool and 10" Single Jet EZ Collapsible Floor Wand to make this work horse of a carpet extractor even more versatile. Separate yourself from your competitors and offer interior soil extraction services to do a better job and generate more revenues!

Detail King also offers an array of tools and accessories for the HP60. In addition, Detail King offers the HP60 in various value packages. Our Extractor Chemical & Maintenance Deluxe Kit has the products you will need not only to effectively clean upholstery and carpets but to also keep your extractor running efficiently every time you use it.

The Mytee HP60 Spyder Offers:

Performance - Using our exclusive REAL HEAT system, the 1,200-watt in-line heater with maximum 210Âº temperature produces hot water that quickly breaks up grease and dirt. The single 3-stage LA (low amp) motor makes the extractor even more effective with 130" water lift and 100 CFM.
Convenience and safety - A 15' vacuum and internal solution hose combo which is 1.25" wide for easy maneuvering in tight spots. The upholstery tool has a low profile end, perfect for detailing and getting within the cracks and crevices of an autos interior. Also, the HP60 comes equipped with a high drain valve for emptying into a standard bucket.
Durability - With a tough, roto-molded polyethylene material that resists rusting and denting.
Compact design - Fits perfectly into a van, truck or storage area.
Customer Service - Mytee® always offers a limited lifetime warranty on the body and a one year warranty on the pump, vacuum motor and heating system. In addition, Mytee has a national network of service centers.

Mytee HP60 Spyder Specifications:

Warranty: Limited lifetime warranty on the body and a one year warranty on the pump, vacuum motor and heating system.
Body: Roto-molded polyethylene
Tank: 5 gallon
Vacuum: Single 3 stage LA
CFM: 100
H20: 130"
Pump: Diaphragm
PSI: 120
GPM: 1.3
Heater: 1200 W - 210 degree maximum
Locking Casters: 3"
Power Cord: Single 25' 12/3
Tools: Mytee Air Lite Upholstery Tool
Hose Package: New 15' vacuum and internal solution hose combo
Product Weight: 69 lbs.
Shipping Weight: 89 lbs.
Product Dimensions: 28" x 15" x 35 3/4"
Shipping Dimensions: 28 1/2" x 17 1/4" x 35 3/4"
